title: Webique Agency
description: Founded and operated a web development agency specializing in custom web applications and SaaS solutions. Led end-to-end project delivery from client consultation to deployment, managing multiple concurrent projects. Built scalable solutions using modern frameworks while establishing efficient development workflows and client communication processes, delivering 20+ projects across various industries.

title: Dual SOFT
description: Developed a high-performance real-time betting platform using microservices architecture. Implemented event-driven communication with Kafka and RabbitMQ, utilized Redis for caching and session management, and built responsive frontend with Angular. Integrated WebSocket connections for live odds updates and PostgreSQL for transaction processing, ensuring system reliability under high concurrent user loads.

title: iMET
description: Developed a modular enterprise management system serving 20,000+ university students and staff using Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend. Created a separate Python/Flask application for automated report generation and data analytics. Designed scalable system architecture with role-based access control and integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality.
